issue.message: The locale folder "`he`" should be called "`iw`" instead; see the `java.util.Locale` documentation
Not targeting the latest versions of Android; compatibility modes apply. Consider testing and updating this version. Consult the android.os.Build.VERSION_CODES javadoc for details.

"fasting" is not translated in "hi" (Hindi), "ps" (Pashto), "pt" (Portuguese), "hr" (Croatian), "hu" (Hungarian), "hy" (Armenian), "ur" (Urdu), "af" (Afrikaans), "uz" (Uzbek), "el" (Greek), "it" (Italian), "zh" (Chinese), "vi" (Vietnamese), "ja" (Japanese), "ro" (Romanian), "no" (Norwegian), "fi" (Finnish), "bg" (Bulgarian), "bn" (Bangla), "jv" (Javanese), "ka" (Georgian), "ca" (Catalan), "sq" (Albanian), "sr" (Serbian), "sv" (Swedish), "ko" (Korean), "ks" (Kashmiri), "ta" (Tamil), "pa" (Punjabi), "pl" (Polish), "he" (Hebrew)
